com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.description:
Task orchestration for Monitoring-NGSIAdapter:
  • Build
  • Package
    • Package-deb
    • Package-rpm
  • Deploy
  • Acceptance-comp

Environment:
  • PYTHON27
    Path to Python 2.7 interpreter
    WORKON_HOME
    Path where new virtualenv will be created
    FIWARE_REPOSITORIES_GIT
    Git URL for FIWARE-Repositories component
    FIWARE_REPOSITORIES_DIR
    Path where FIWARE-Repositories component is downloaded
    OS_USERNAME
    Username of OpenStack credentials needed to upload packages
    OS_PASSWORD
    Password of OpenStack credentials needed to upload packages
    OS_TENANT_NAME
    Tenant of OpenStack credentials needed to upload packages

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: REPOSITORY
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Specify the repository to track. By default: 'telefonicaid/fiware-monitoring'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WORKSPACE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Common workspace for all the jobs in this flow

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: ENVIRONMENT
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
Environment where the component will be deployed and tested

Values:
  • dev: Experimentation environment (default value)
